item.title: Week 1
item.description: > Dashboard > Power Circuits Electrical Power - DC $$P = U\cdot I = R\cdot I^{2}=\frac{U^{2}}{R}$$ $P:$ power in $\text{W}$

item.title: Week 2
item.description: > Dashboard > Power Circuits Transformers A transformer is an electrical device that transfer energy between two circuits through electromagnectic induction.
